author: benh
msg: There is a race condition with how quickly the master starts up from how quickly the slave starts, this is exacerbated with the new design (i.e., GOT_MASTER_SEQ), so this fixes the SlaveLost test.

author: benh
msg: Changing log output from ERROR to WARNING, since this isn't that serious of an event.

author: benh
msg: An external zookeeper can now be used using configure --with-zookeeper=dir_to_c_src

author: benh
msg: Cool bug: apparently on Mac OS X there are issues doing a __attribute((constructor)) in one thread that uses a static library that might not have been initialized yet. This commit does a work around that doesn't use the __attribute__((constructor)).

author: benh
msg: Changes to libprocess to make it have subsecond timers.
